RULE.DESCRIPTION: Checks whether the ShortName of a ShortNamedThing is valid
Checks whether the specified LanguageCode is a valid LanguageCode as specified in ISO 639-1 part 1 or part 2
Checks whether EmailAddress.value is a valid email address as specified in IETF RFC 5321
Checks whether TelephoneNumber.value is a valid telephone number as specified in IETF RFC 3966
Checks whether the specified LanguageCode exists in the SiteDirectory
Checks whether the Owner DomainOfExpertise is one of the activeDomains of the EngineeringModelSetup that is referenced by the container EngineeringModel
Checks whether a referenced Category is the in chain of Reference Data Libraries
Checks whether a referenced FileType is the in chain of Reference Data Libraries
Checks whether a referenced ParameterType is the in chain of Reference Data Libraries
Checks whether a referenced MeasurementScale is the in chain of Reference Data Libraries
Checks whether a referenced MeasurementUnit is the in chain of Reference Data Libraries
Checks whether a referenced Rule is the in chain of Reference Data Libraries
Checks whether a referenced ReferenceSource is the in chain of Reference Data Libraries
RULE.NOTES: instances of DomainOfExpertise, DomainOfExpertiseGroup, EngineeringModelSetup, ParticipantRole, PersonRole, ReferenceDataLibrary are excluded from this check

RULE.DESCRIPTION: Checks whether a referenced UnitPrefix is the in chain of Reference Data Libraries
Checks whether a CategorizableThing is not a member of the same Category more than once, including via category sub-classing
Checks whether a CategorizableThing is not a member of an abstract Category
Checks whether a DefinedThing has at most one Definition per natural language
Checks whether a Thing does not reference a DeprecatableThing where DeprecatableThing.isDeprecated = true
RULE.NOTES: DeprecatableThing where DeprecatableThingisDeprecated = true are ignored

RULE.DESCRIPTION: Checks whether the source and target property of a BinaryRelationship are contained by the same Iteration that contains the BinaryRelationship
Checks whether a Parameter does not reference a CompoundParameterType where CompoundParameterType.isFinalized = false
Checks whether an ElementDefinition contains parameters that have unique names
Checks whether an ElementDefinition contains parameters that have unique shortnames
Checks whether a ParameterType.shortname is case-sensitive unique within its containing ReferenceDataLibrary
Checks whether a ParameterType.symbol is case-sensitive unique within its containing ReferenceDataLibrary
Checks whether a Category.shortname is unique within its containing ReferenceDataLibrary
Checks whether a Category.name is unique within its containing ReferenceDataLibrary
Checks whether a ParameterTypeComponent has a valid scale
Checks whether the QuantityKind.defaultScale is in the collection of all PossibleScales
Checks whether the Requirement.shortname unique within its containing RequirementsSpecification
Checks whether the ShortnamedThing.shortname is unique within its Container
